extendedInfo.description: Do you want to know what your dreams mean? The Dreams Cloud app is the easiest, most convenient way to write your dreams, share them, AND receive personalized responses about the meaning of your dreams. Best of all, itâs FREE, and 100% secure and confidential.HOW IT WORKS:Dreams Cloud is a dream journal, and so much more! With the app, you can:Â·      Log your dreams quickly and easily â keep it handy by your bedside to record when you wake up.Â·      Receive professional reflections on the meaning of your dreams. â¨â¨Â·      Capture everything related to your dreams like colors, numbers, moods, emotions and key words.Â·      Safe-keep your dreams forever in a secure, private dream journal (or create multiple journals).Â·      Share your dreams publicly and anonymously â and read other peopleâs public dream posts - or share with friends privately.Â·      Read and update your past dreams and reflections 24/7 via your app or the Dreams Cloud website.WHO ITâS FOR:Anyone and everyone who is interested in dreams in general, or who wants to remember and make sense of their dreams. The app provides dream journaling, dream logging, dream sharing capabilities and info on dream meanings.For more info - or to explore our resources includes dream blogs, videos, and more â see our website at www.DreamsCloud.com

reviews.title: Very nice app
reviews.comment: DreamsCloud is a very nice app that help to explore the dreams. From this app, we can share and write the dreams very easily and get responses very soon. I would like to recommend the app to my other friends. Thanks for creating such app.
reviews.author: Jibesh Sitikhu

reviews.title: The best app ever
reviews.comment: This is an amazing app for everyone who use android smartphone! Its awesome because we have not to pay to get this valuable software and this is very useful and enjoyable app which I ever has been seen!
reviews.author: Kasun Lakmal

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: This is really a nice app to fulfill my demand. Finally I found the best app to analyze my dreams. Every android user should download This app. Thank you to the professionals who interpret my dreams.
reviews.author: Shahriar khan

reviews.title: Dream comes true
reviews.comment: Really one of the new and innovative app that help us to explain meaning of our dreams. Also it is completely free to use. Now i can know the professional reflection on the meaning of my dreams through this app. It working very fine to me.
reviews.author: Ariful Islam Zinuk

reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
reviews.comment: Wow!! I think this is the first app which gives response to your dreams.....It\'s really true....I posted my dream and I got an appropriate response for it......I really love this app....thanx for the app designer:-)
reviews.author: lavanya ratala

reviews.title: It Force Closes!
reviews.comment: The app itself is all right. The features and functions are great but one thing. It  force closes! I love to share my reflections but I can\'t because of that! Please fix it.
reviews.author: Koronoa Klonoa

reviews.title: Just try it
reviews.comment: I just tried this app and i can say it is best app i ever tried about dreams! i strongly recommend this app to everyone who believe that dreams have meaning.Just try it now!

reviews.title: wanted app
reviews.comment: Oh! a very nice app that i want ever, Dreams Cloud explain my dream. It\'s unbelievable!

reviews.title: Brilliant effort
reviews.comment: I have been using this app for about 2 weeks now. Thank you to the professionals who interpret my dreams.

reviews.title: Love Dreamscloud
reviews.comment: I love everything about Dreamscloud. Because logging my dreams and receiving reflections from other users. This is really awesome. I did not find such app before. So I like it very much.

Dreams Cloud is a dream journal who show your dream over world easily lark it through internet. Have no installation and opening problem. Thanks to the developer to create it.

reviews.comment: Just try it I just tried this app and i can say it is best app ! i strongly recommend this app to everyone.Just try it

reviews.title: Good dream journal app
reviews.comment: I was always interested in keeping a dream journal because i wanted to search for their meanings. Writing all into some notebook was too risky, so i\'ve searched for an app where i could hide it from my siblings and then i found DreamsCloud. It is a really good app and i recommend it to anyone who wants to keep a secret dream journal.

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: This app will helps to show your dream and fulfill the dream. It is very best apps in the history of android apps and useful too. We can log our dream as our wish easily. we can keep our dreams secure and more private here.

reviews.title: santhosh tm

reviews.title: Great app to use
reviews.comment: The Dreams Cloud app is one of the easiest, most convenient way to express my  dreams, share them and receive personalized responses about the meaning of my expressed dreams. In a word it is awesome to use in my mobile. Five stars.

reviews.title: DreamsCloud is a nice android app.......
reviews.comment: DreamsCloud is a nice app it can easily share your dream with your friends. I like the app, for it\'s good feature, easy sharing process and receive personalized responses about the meaning of my dreams. Thanks for sharing the app.
